content: {"name": "St. Patrick Senior Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Provides meals with a small donation: $2 for members and $5 for non-members.", "email": "", "url": "https://stpatsrctr.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "58 Parsons Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Cass Corridor", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48201", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3485053, "longitude": -83.0598385}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 833-0857", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Donations required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}]}
